short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically replaces any known names of gunmen involved in mass shootings to '[Name Redacted]'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gunmen in mass shootings are giant douches. Let's make sure they're forgotten by replacing all names of known gunmen with '[Name Redacted]'.

This extension updates regularly with the names of known gunmen to replace gunmen names with the word '[Name Redacted]'. Because screw those guys.

Update 0.2: Added a few more names
